name: Improved Steal

sections.text:
You gain a bonus equal to half your tier on checks to attempt a steal combat maneuver, and to your CMD when an opponent attempts a steal combat maneuver on you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Improved Steal.

Furthermore, you can make an attack of opportunity against any creature that attempts a steal maneuver against, you unless it also has this feat.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Your light fingers can lift even the most closely held item off an enemy.
